questionTitle: My phones is out of order, which is a ________.
The organizers decided to go ahead with the match ________ the bad weather.
He kept his job ________ the manager had threatened to sack him.
It takes most people three or four days to ________ from flu.
The house has been left empty for a long time; it will be expensive to ________ the damage that has been done.
We were ________ by the noise in the forest.
No thanks, I won't have another chocolate: I'm trying to ________ weight.
Is there ________ at all I can do to help?
I'm afraid I can't repair the car: we'll have to wait until the mechanic ________.
________ you do better work than this, you won't pass the exam.
My parents got up very early this morning ________ pack the car for our journey.
"I ________ that a shame!" she said, when she heard that Alex had been sacked.
The deer ________ for the shelter of the forest when there are people about.
Everybody is very anxious about the ________ of the negotiations.
We have been corresponding ________ each other for years.
When he was questioned about the missing ring, he firmly ________ that he had ever seen it.
Have you ever been introduced to ________?
She's rung ________ I must have said something to upset her.
The police set a ________ to catch the thieves.
The rise in the house prices ________ him to seel his house for a large profit.
